element.name: Fey Wanderer (2024)
element.description: The Fey Wanderer is a connection between the wilds and the Feywild, using charm and magic to enhance their abilities.

feature.name: Fey Wanderer Magic
feature.description: At 3rd level, you learn two spells: *Faerie Fire* and *Misty Step*.

feature.name: Fey Step
feature.description: You can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see, once per short rest.

feature.name: Dreadful Strikes
feature.description: You can add your Charisma modifier to the damage of your weapon attacks.

feature.name: Beguiling Twist
feature.description: As a reaction, force a creature to make a Wisdom saving throw or become charmed by you for 1 minute.

feature.name: Misleading Step
feature.description: Once per long rest, when you take damage, you can teleport 30 feet and gain advantage on your next attack roll.
